Articles.Content:
I bring you back to normal space-time and saw through your bones

my hill

All of the time-spaces merge due to the will of Odin, and the resulting twisted wreck of a hill is bulldozed back to its proper height, planted with grass and trees, and a flag pole raised at its peak. 

Now then, shall we have a picnic lunch?

Yes we shall. \*Stabs you in the back while we have the picnic, claim the hill, and build impenetrable defenses.\*

My hill.

Well, now that the paradox sorted itself out, by destiny I must fire that 120mm HE round again...

My hill!

I throw a anti tank grenade into your grenade, destroying it and you.

My hill with burnt out tank.

I snipe you, build impenetrable defenses, and claim the hill.

MINE

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/jOKf5r_JMAo?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I drop this sucker on your "impenetrable" defenses  
  
Mine

I bombard your hill from space using photon torpedoes.

my hill
It's my hill now, thank you very much!

first i throw you off the hill then dig in to the hart of the hill and replace the magic reset button and make it the very being on the hill so it cant be removed at all. then place you back on top of the hill and strap you to it.

its your hill but i have the reset button and its incoded to only me and odin.

photon torpedoes! I blow the living daylights out of your hill, then i roemove the planet upon which the hill is on from normal space time.

my hill.

the hill resets and moves it back to real space and collapses this pocket of space time you talk about with the warp.

still your hill but its in normal space time now enjoy.

Nanocloud.

The daleks' hill.

I attack you with my newest super-powered ultra-boostered neutro-proto-electro-photon rocket powred by the biggest engine ever. You dead.

I own the hill, and build a force field around it.

i warp in to the field and push you out then proceed to plant a tree at the top of the hill.

my hill
I build a new hill. my hill.

i blow up your hill (there shall only be one) there for my hill being the only hill in exsistence its still mine.

still my hill.

(sorry its just that i have the other hill setup to keep it from dieing and your hill would be blown up in the next post any way so ya sorry)

**Edited <time datetime="2014-01-14T13:19:47Z" title="01/14/2014 01:19  PM" data-short="10 yr">January 14, 2014</time> by toolofdarkness**

I nuke the hills.

My vaporized hills.

the hill resets there for you have a hill now but you die in the radioactive radiation left behind from the nukes and i clam it and not die due to my power armor. then proceed to clean up the radiation and plant a tree.

my hill

You see me killing you in future, but then you realise you died two years ago. You are stuck in an always paradox. I cut that tree and plant a coffee bush.

My hill.

due to the always paradox i become insane and turn to the dark gods(chaos demons like Nurgle) and become a fallen and due ti this im able to kill you be fore you kill me but never let you see it there for you disapear in a puff of logic and the hill is still my hill.

still my hill and due to the rule of paradox the hill is now in every point in time and space.

The Google Picture War invades.

This hill is now property of Google.

I'll just cut this wire and \*Internet shuts down\* ... there.

My hill
I just shoot you in the head, claim the hill, and build impenetrable defenses.
Nothing is impenetrable. I surround the hill with immense walls and flood the entire space. My underwater hill.
